summary:
Create bonemeal from skulls
<br />Create salt piles from salt ore
descriptionHtml:
Bit fed up with scavaging every barrel in game to find salt piles? Rummaging through piles of dead skeletons to get that elusive bonemeal?

This mod will make it easier to get those ingredients without breaking immersion (to much).

Added 2 saltmines, one near Winterhold and one northeast of Pinefrost Tower.
1 saltore will create 3 salt piles by using a cooking pot.

It is now possible to burn human skulls and troll skulls in the smelter under MISC to create bonemeal.
author: swilden
